Key Match Events: India made 229-9 with Rohit Sharma hitting 87
England bowled out for 129 in 34.5 overs - Livingstone top-scores with 27
Post-Match Reflections: England have now lost four successive games and five of their first six
India continue unbeaten start with 100-run victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are all but out but will be knocked out with defeat against Australia on Saturday
